citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on 14
August 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by speaking with the licensee's sister who stated he would
not be available until late afternoon. Also, spoke with the licensee by phone who confirmed he would not be available
today for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on 14 
August 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by speaking with the licensee's sister who stated he would 
not be available until late afternoon. Also, spoke with the licensee by phone who confirmed he would not be available 
today for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation 
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
